alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 6:19PM EST until January 13 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Anne Arundel County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 5 AM EST Saturday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 7 AM to 4 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... The winds will briefly subside overnight before increasing behind the cold front Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
